column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Laura - Thank you for the great review! I'm happy to know you enjoyed your meal with us
column2: and your suggestions and tips are all on-point. We appreciate your understanding in regards to our wait times and the typically fast pace at which we serve our tapas dishes and ramen bowls. We are grateful for your business
column3: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
